provisions.title: Article 13 - ;
provisions.content: On proposal by the Minister of Public Service and Labour; After consideration and approval by the Cabinet, in its session of 28/01/2019; HAVE ORDERED AND ORDER:

provisions.title: Article 1 - Appointment of members of
provisions.content: the Board of Directors and their term of office The following persons are appointed members of the Board of Directors of Rwanda Food and Drugs Authority (Rwanda FDA): 1° Dr KARITA Etienne, Chairperson; 2° Dr MUKANTWALI Christine, Deputy Chairperson; 3° Ms AKLILLU Eleni; 4° Dr CHABNER Bruce; 5° Dr KAYIHURA Didas; 6° Dr RUHARA Charles; MURINDABIGWI 7° Ms UMURUNGI Providence. The members of the Board of Directors of Rwanda FDA serve for a term of office of three (3) years renewable once.

provisions.title: Article 2 - Authorities responsible for the
provisions.content: implementation of this Order The Prime Minister, the Minister of Public Service and Labour, the Minister of Health and the Minister of Finance and Economic Planning are entrusted with the implementation of this Order.

provisions.title: Article 3 - Repealing provision
provisions.content: All prior provisions contrary to this Order are repealed.

provisions.title: Article 4 - Commencement
provisions.content: This Order comes into force on the date of its publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda. It takes effect as of 28/01/2019. Kigali, on 16/08/2019 (sé) KAGAME Paul President of the Republic (sé) Dr NGIRENTE Edouard Prime Minister Seen and sealed with the Seal of the Republic: (sé) BUSINGYE Johnston Minister of Justice/Attorney General
